Detailed Description

template<class IdTraits, class Cmp = std::less<typename IdTraits::id_type>>
struct TREX::utils::id_cmp< IdTraits, Cmp >

list_set sorting functor

Template Parameters:
IdTraits A traits for identifier extraction
Cmp A comparison functor

This is a functor used by the template list_set class to know how to compare and sort its elements

Author:
Frderic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

list_set
